Module com.ning.breakout
Package com.ning.breakout.controller

Class PreferencesController

java.lang.Object
com.ning.breakout.controller.NormalSceneController
com.ning.breakout.controller.PreferencesController
public class PreferencesController extends NormalSceneController
The controller class of the preference scene, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the preference scene.
Author:
Ning ZHU

    • PreferencesController

      public PreferencesController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the hash table of the color themes and sets the items of the combo box.

    • saveChoice

      public void saveChoice()
      Passes selected preference to the Main class (StartGame).

      The selected preference will be passed to Main class (StartGame) when the save button clicked. Notes that if no item selected, user will receive an alert.

    • backToMain

      public void backToMain()
      Switches to the main menu when the back button clicked.
      See Also:
      • StartGame.switchToMainMenu()

    • themeSelected

      public void themeSelected()
      Chooses the color theme of the game board when items in combo box selected.

    • chooseDefault

      public void chooseDefault()
      Chooses the default theme when the image of the default theme clicked.

    • chooseBlackAndWhite

      public void chooseBlackAndWhite()
      Chooses the black and white theme when the image of black and white theme clicked.

    • chooseColorful

      public void chooseColorful()
      Chooses the colorful theme when the image of colorful theme clicked.
